registration.SUBJECT: 【YS】- 請驗證您的電子信箱
registration.DESCRIPTION: 為了激活 YS 權限，我們需要驗證您的電子信箱
registration.HINT: 如果您不想使用 YS ，可以略過這封郵件，我們會刪除這個帳號
registration.MESSAGE:
Hello %s.

Welcome! To verify your email, please click in this link:

%s/verify/%s

Thank you.

forgotPassword.SUBJECT: 【YS】- 重新設定您的密碼
forgotPassword.DESCRIPTION: 請點選鏈結進入密碼重設頁面
forgotPassword.HINT: 如果您不想重新設定 YS 密碼，可以略過這封郵件
forgotPassword.MESSAGE:
To recover the password for user: %s

click the following link:

%s/reset-password/%s

If this was a mistake, you can ignore this message.

Thank you.
